text: The Trump Admin's new tax form fits on a postcard –& still requires 6 additional forms. It won’t save you time or money. To make Tax Day easier & cheaper, Congress should pass my bill to let millions of Americans simply sign & return a pre-filled tax form. https://www.vox.com/policy-and-politics/2018/6/26/17505614/tax-postcard-schedules

Today’s anniversary of the Voting Rights Act is a reminder that we still have so much more to do to protect voting rights for all Americans. 

Please honor the legacy of this landmark bill by exercising your democratic right—register & commit to vote! http://www.iwillvote.org

The Voting Rights Act, which aimed to protect the right to vote for all Americans, was signed into law on this day in 1965. Forty-eight years later, the Supreme Court gutted the Act. Congress must reinvigorate those vital protections to fortify our fundamental voting rights. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dj7X4WwUUAAG_fO.jpg
